verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H94>Agur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3348>Jakeh,<s%> even the <S%H4853>prophecy:<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5002>spoke<s%> to <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> even to <S%H384>Ithiel<s%> and <S%H401>Ucal,<s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> I am more <S%H1197>brutish<s%> than any <S%H376>man,<s%> and have not the <S%H998>understanding<s%> of a <S%H120>man.<s%>
I <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3925>learned<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> nor have the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H5927>ascended<s%> up into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> or <S%H3381>descended?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> in his <S%H2651>fists?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H6887>bound<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in a <S%H8071>garment?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> if you can <S%H3045>tell?<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H565>word<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H6884>pure:<s%> he is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to them that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
<S%H3254>Add<s%> you not to his <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H3198>reprove<s%> you, and you be found a <S%H376>liar.<s%> <S%H3576><s%>
<S%H8147>Two<s%> things have I <S%H7592>required<s%> of you; <S%H4513>deny<s%> me them not <S%H2962>before<s%> I <S%H4191>die:<s%>

<S%H7368>Remove<s%> <S%H7369>far<s%> from me <S%H7723>vanity<s%> and <S%H3576>lies:<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H7389>poverty<s%> nor <S%H6239>riches;<s%> <S%H2963>feed<s%> me with <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H2706>convenient<s%> for me:

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> I be <S%H7646>full,<s%> and <S%H3584>deny<s%> you, and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> or <S%H6435>lest<s%> I be <S%H3423>poor,<s%> and <S%H1589>steal,<s%> and <S%H8610>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of my <S%H430>God<s%> in vain.
<S%H3960>Accuse<s%> not a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to his <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H7043>curse<s%> you, and you be found <S%H816>guilty.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H7043>curses<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> and does not <S%H1288>bless<s%> their <S%H517>mother.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that are <S%H2889>pure<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and yet is not <S%H7364>washed<s%> from their <S%H6675>filthiness.<s%>
There is a <S%H1755>generation,<s%> O <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H7311>lofty<s%> are their <S%H5869>eyes!<s%> and their <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> are <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up.

There is a <S%H1755>generation,<s%> whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are as <S%H2719>swords,<s%> and their <S%H4973>jaw<s%> <S%H4973>teeth<s%> as <S%H3979>knives,<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from off the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> from among <S%H120>men.<s%>

The horse <S%H5936>leach<s%> has <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> crying, <S%H3051>Give,<s%> <S%H3051>give.<s%> There are <S%H7969>three<s%> things that are <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> yes, <S%H702>four<s%> things <S%H559>say<s%> not, It is <S%H1952>enough:<s%>

The <S%H7585>grave;<s%> and the <S%H6115>barren<s%> <S%H7356>womb;<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is not <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H559>said<s%> not, It is <S%H1952>enough.<s%>

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> that <S%H3932>mocks<s%> at his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H936>despises<s%> to <S%H3349>obey<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall <S%H5365>pick<s%> it out, and the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H5404>eagles<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which are too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for me, yes, <S%H702>four<s%> which I <S%H3045>know<s%> not:

The <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> in the <S%H8064>air;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> on a <S%H6697>rock;<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H591>ship<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> with a <S%H5959>maid.<s%>

<S%H3651>Such<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of an <S%H5003>adulterous<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%> she <S%H398>eats,<s%> and <S%H4229>wipes<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H205>wickedness.<s%>
For <S%H7969>three<s%> things the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7264>disquieted,<s%> and for <S%H702>four<s%> which it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5375>bear:<s%>
For a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> and a <S%H5036>fool<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>meat;<s%>
For an <S%H8130>odious<s%> woman <S%H3588>when<s%> she is <S%H1166>married;<s%> and an <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> that is <S%H3423>heir<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress.<s%>
There be <S%H702>four<s%> things which are <S%H6996>little<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but they are exceeding <S%H2450>wise:<s%>
The <S%H5244>ants<s%> are a <S%H5971>people<s%> not <S%H5794>strong,<s%> yet they <S%H3559>prepare<s%> their <S%H3899>meat<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer;<s%>
The <S%H8227>conies<s%> are but a <S%H3808>feeble<s%> <S%H6099><s%> <S%H5971>folk,<s%> yet <S%H7760>make<s%> they their <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5553>rocks;<s%>
The <S%H697>locusts<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> yet <S%H3318>go<s%> they <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them by <S%H2686>bands;<s%>
The <S%H8079>spider<s%> <S%H8610>takes<s%> <S%H8610>hold<s%> with her <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and is in <S%H4428>kings'<s%> <S%H1964>palaces.<s%>
There be <S%H7969>three<s%> things which <S%H3190>go<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> yes, <S%H702>four<s%> are <S%H3190>comely<s%> in <S%H3212>going:<s%>
A <S%H3918>lion<s%> which is <S%H1368>strongest<s%> among <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H7725>turns<s%> not away for <S%H3605>any;<s%>
A <S%H2223>greyhound;<s%> <S%H4975><s%> an he <S%H8495>goat<s%> <S%H176>also;<s%> and a <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H5973>whom<s%> there is <S%H510>no<s%> <S%H510>rising<s%> up.
<S%H518>If<s%> you have done <S%H5034>foolishly<s%> in <S%H5375>lifting<s%> up yourself, or <S%H518>if<s%> you have <S%H2161>thought<s%> evil, lay your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

<S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H4330>churning<s%> of <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> and the <S%H4330>wringing<s%> of the <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1818>blood:<s%> so the <S%H4330>forcing<s%> of <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7379>strife.<s%>
